intent_atoms.description: Extend outline filters to support box categories and streaming metadata for UI consumers
Added reusable box classification helpers in ISOInspectorKit exposing BoxCategory and streaming indicator detection

functional_units.name: Box Category Classification Helper
functional_units.description: Provides reusable helpers to expose box categories for UI consumers

functional_units.name: Streaming Metadata Detection Helper
functional_units.description: Detects streaming indicators within boxes and exposes them for UI consumption

functional_units.name: Outline View Model Filter Extension
functional_units.description: Extends the outline view model filter to support category chips, a streaming toggle, and maintains severity filtering compatibility
